commandlist:
`<+><search>` - search using keywords
`<+><version>` - version preferences and information
`<+><random>` - get a random Bible verse
`<+><truerandom>` - get a truly random Bible verse
`<+><dailyverse>` - daily verses and automation
`<+><formatting>` - formatting preferences for verse styles
`<+><language>` - language preferences and information
`<+><misc>` - miscellaneous server settings
`<+><stats>` - view bot statistics
`<+><invite>` - get the invite link for BibleBot

`<+><creeds>` - ecumenical creeds (contains further commands)
usage: Per usare BibleBot, basta scrivere un versetto. Mi occupo io del resto.
creeds_text: Ecco i credi che sono contenuti in BibleBot:
catechisms_text: Ecco il catechismo che e disponibile in BibleBot:
passagetoolong: Questo passaggio è troppo lungo. Riprova di nuovo oppure usa un stile diverso (`<+><formatting><setdisplay>').
versionused: Your preferred version is set to <version>.
guildversionused: The server's preferred version is set to <version>.
setserverversionusage: imposta la versione predefinita del server (solo per il staff)
setserverlanguageusage: imposta la lingua preferita del server (solo per staff)
prefixonechar: Il prefisso deve essere un singolo carattere.
guildbracketsused: The server's ignoring brackets are set to <brackets>.
setprefixusage: imposta il prefisso dei comandi del server
formatting: Your display style is set to <value>.
formattingfail: Use `<+><formatting> <setdisplay>` with one of the following parameters: `default, embed, blockquote, code`
noguildperm: You must have the 'Manage Server' permission to modify this setting.
failedsearch: You may have to try a different query.
failedpreference: Failed to set preference. This is likely a database error and should be reported to the support server. See +biblebot for the invite.
setguildversionfail: Failed to set server version, see `<+><version> <list>`.
setguildlanguagefail: Failed to set server language, see `<+><language> <list>`.
guildbracketsfail: Failed to set ignoring brackets, the supported options are `<>`, `[]`, `()`, `{}`.
setvotdtimeusage: To setup the automatic daily verse, go to <https://biblebot.xyz/dailyversesetup>.
votdtimeused:
The daily verse will be sent at `<time>` in the <tz> timezone and will be published in <channel>.

It will use <version>.
novotdtimeused: The automatic daily verse has not been set for this server.
clearvotdtimesuccess: The automatic daily verse successfully cleared.
votdcantprocess: The daily verse can't be processed, see <https://www.biblegateway.com/>.
versioninfo:
**<versionname>**

Contains Old Testament: <hasOT>
Contains New Testament: <hasNT>
Contains Apocrypha/Deuterocanon: <hasDEU>
versioninfofailed: Non sono riuscito a trovare quella versione, sei sicuro di aver utilizzato l'acronimo corretto?
queryTooShort: La tua query di ricerca deve essere più lunga di 3 caratteri.
searchNotSupported: <+><search> is not supported by this version.
plswait: Please wait for your existing command to finish before starting another.
supporters: Un ringraziamento speciale per i seguenti contributori:
invalidsection: The version you are using does not support this section of the Bible.
author: da <author>
